Author: img
Name: Island Workshop Search
Description:
Search items by splitting search terms with | 
     Example: papri|shark|ink 

Step-by-step search by splitting terms with a comma [ , ] 
     Example: poti,garn,horn 
     Will search for 'poti' first, then after adding and reopening window, will search for 'garn' 

 Or just copy and paste the entire Overseas Casuals Squawkbox recommendations. 

Works with every game client language.
